admin.description: A user who has all power on the admin side of things. Since he's not a missionary, he doesn't see the missionary side.

clerk.description: The clerk. Can see clerk related pages.

secretary.description: The secretary. Can see secretary related pages.

AP.description: Assistants to the President. Can see regular missionary pages.

ZL.description: Zone Leaders. Can see regular missionary pages.

ZDL.description: Zone leaders who serve as District Leaders. Can see regular missionary pages.

STL.description: Sister Training Leaders. Can see regular missionary pages.

DL.description: District Leaders. Can see regular missionary pages.

TR.description: Trainer. Can see regular missionary pages.

DT.description: District Training Leader. Can see regular missionary pages.

NM.description: New Missionary. Can see regular missionary pages.

SC.description: Senior companion. Can see regular missionary pages.

JC.description: Junior companion. Can see regular missionary pages.

inactive.description: A missionary no longer in the field. Will be deleted with time.

unknown.description: A missionary with an unknown position. Check for typos, or consider adding new positions in /public/assets/user_types.json
